title: Merging accounts
body: My cousin gave me an account in the Latin America North server that i played on a bit before changing to a North America account because I didn't understand the language. My old one that my cousin gave has some skins, champions and wards that I really want. Is there any way I can get the stuff from my Latin America North account to my North America?

replies.body:
The most you can do is transfer regions of that account from Latin America to North America and just continue to use it. Also I suggest changing passwords and reverifying the email to truly make it yours so you don't get in trouble for "account sharing"

You can also change your name if you don't like the original name

First and foremost, account sharing is not something we support. Not only does it compromise account security, but it also works against the integrity of the game. Unfortunately, you cannot transfer content from one account to another.

Let me know if you have any questions.
